title: Social Media Platform Schema
description: Schema for social media platform data used in username search optimization

name.description: Name of the social media platform

urlTemplate.description: URL template with placeholder for username (e.g. https://example.com/{username})

statusCheckMethod.description: Method to determine if profile exists

successCodes.description: HTTP status codes indicating profile exists

failureCodes.description: HTTP status codes indicating profile not found

successPattern.description: Regex pattern that indicates profile exists in page content

failurePattern.description: Regex pattern that indicates profile does not exist

responseTimeThresholdMs.description: Maximum response time threshold in milliseconds

rateLimitDelayMs.description: Minimum delay between requests to avoid rate limiting

supportsVerification.description: Whether the platform supports account verification

requiresAuthForDetails.description: Whether authentication is required to get detailed info
